results.title: Renin-angiotensin-aldosterone system inhibitors and mortality risk in elderly patients with atrial fibrillation. Insights from the nationwide START registry.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: Arterial @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ is the most common @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular@@@ comorbidity in @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@).

PMID: 37648584

results.title: An 84-Year-Old Physician With Progressive Dyspnea and Bilateral Upper Lobe Opacities.
results.text_hl: Medical history included paroxysmal @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Hashimoto_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D050031 @@@Hashimoto's thyroiditis@@@, and @DISEASE_Carnevale_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C535586 @@@OSA@@@.

results.title: Study on the Effect of Irbesartan on Atrial Fibrillation Recurrence in Kumamoto: Atrial Fibrillation Suppression Trial (SILK study).
results.text_hl: There was no significant difference in the @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@/@DISEASE_Tachycardia_Supraventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D013617 @@@AT@@@ recurrence between the @CHEMICAL_Irbesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077405 @@@irbesartan@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ groups.

results.title: Comparative evaluation of effect of valsartan/amlodipine and atenolol/amlodipine combinations on atrial fibrillation recurrence in hypertensive patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to compare the effect of @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ combination in preventing the recurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@) in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with a history of recent paroxysmal @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@.

results.title: Reduced incidence of new-onset atrial fibrillation with angiotensin II receptor blockade: the VALUE trial.
results.text_hl: The incidence of persistent @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@ was 1.35% with @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@ and 1.97% with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ [unadjusted hazard ratio 0.683 (95% CI: 0.525, 0.889), P = 0.0046].

citations.NLM: Schmieder RE, Kjeldsen SE, Julius S, McInnes GT, Zanchetti A, Hua TA, VALUE Trial Group. Reduced incidence of new-onset atrial fibrillation with angiotensin II receptor blockade: the VALUE trial. J Hypertens. 2008 Mar;26(3):403-11. PMID: 18300848

results.title: Losartan and prevention of atrial fibrillation recurrence in hypertensive patients.
results.text_hl: The aim of the study was to evaluate the effect of @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ as compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, both associated with @CHEMICAL_Amiodarone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000638 @@@amiodarone@@@, in preventing the recurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@) in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with a history of recent paroxysmal @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@.

results.title: Effect of valsartan and ramipril on atrial fibrillation recurrence and P-wave dispersion in hypertensive patients with recurrent symptomatic lone atrial fibrillation.
results.text_hl: A total of 46 (47.4%) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ had a recurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@ as did 26 (27.9%) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@ (P < 0.01 vs.

results.title: Effect of telmisartan and ramipril on atrial fibrillation recurrence and severity in hypertensive patients with metabolic syndrome and recurrent symptomatic paroxysmal and persistent atrial fibrillation.
results.text_hl: Ventricular rate and TnI at the first @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@ recurrence were significantly lower with @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@ than with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

results.title: Effect of telmisartan on paroxysmal atrial fibrillation recurrence in hypertensive patients with normal or increased left atrial size.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@Telmisartan@@@ was more effective than @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in preventing @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@ recurrences in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@paroxysmal AF@@@.
